txt.en: [placeholder] Fires allowed to burn near archers

Dunlending men have begun carrying loose stones towards the Dike in an attempt to dam the stream through the trench. The Rohirrim archers will do what they can to prevent the barrier from being erected, but will need your leadership to coordinate their fire.
Dunlendings have placed a stone obstruction ([placeholder]/5)
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow Dunlendings to place stone obstructions ([placeholder]/5)</rgb>

Rohirrim Archers have spotted Dunlendings attempting to block the flow of water through the dike by creating a stone barrier. Keep the Archers in good health and coordinate their fire against the approaching Dunlendings. Extinguish any fires set near archers so that their aim remains unimpaired.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Point Loss</rgb>
* Rohirrim Archer defeated
* Dunlending reaches the grate and places a rock

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Point Loss</rgb>
* Fire set near an Archer continues burning
